segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako avisārado agāraṃ ajjhāvasati.
segments.en: “A lay follower living at home with five qualities is not self-assured.
They kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, and use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato upāsako avisārado agāraṃ ajjhāvasati.
segments.en: A lay follower living at home with these five qualities is not self-assured.

segments.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako visārado agāraṃ ajjhāvasati.
segments.en: A lay follower living at home with these five qualities is self-assured.

segments.pli: Pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti … pe … surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti.
segments.en: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato upāsako visārado agāraṃ ajjhāvasatī”ti.
segments.en: A lay follower living at home with these five qualities is self-assured.”
